name: The 11th Advanced Academic Rheumatology Review Course (11th ADARRC)
content: Established in 2011, ADARRC is a one-stop-shop for clinicians looking for a comprehensive update on adult and pediatric rheumatology. In an endeavor to bring to medical professionals the latest developments and trends surrounding rheumatology, the 11th annual Advanced Academic Rheumatology Review Course (ADARRC) will take place from 21-23 October 2021 at Sofitel Dubai The Obelisk, United Arab Emirates. ADARRC is designed with a series of lectures, workshops, and a summit delivered by global experts to ensure the attendees gain new insights, case studies, and pioneering research findings. Structured in a postgraduate platform that aims to provide the highest standard of scientific and educational content to achieve progress in the clinical care of patients with rheumatic musculoskeletal disease (RMD). ADARRC aims to bring together everyone who plays a pivotal role in rheumatology — researchers, patients, providers, technologists, and policy leaders — and encourage them to work together to build a framework for health care transformation.
organizers: K.I.T. Group Middle East FZ LLC
